ygData.subject: Re: Questing
ygData.msgSnippet: Yes, that s right.. the Ancient Crock in Guk.  I haven t gone there to try camping for the leggings yet.. i hear it is heavily camped.. but one day soon i ll
ygData.messageBody:
Yes, that's right.. the Ancient Crock in Guk. I haven't gone there to try
camping for the leggings yet.. i hear it is heavily camped.. but one day
soon i'll give it a shot.

-Eachann Bronzeleaf
-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew marr

-----Original Message-----
From: Sianne . <maggee1@...>
To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
Date: Tuesday, November 23, 1999 4:28 PM
Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Questing


>From: "Sianne ." <maggee1@...>
>
>and gatorscale leggings come from the ancient croc....right?
>
>Sianne
>Xegony
>
>
>>From: "Jeff Portwine" <jdport@...>
>>Reply-To: EQ-Clerics@onelist.com
>>To: <EQ-Clerics@onelist.com>
>>Subject: Re: [EQ-Clerics] Questing
>>Date: Tue, 23 Nov 1999 12:09:04 -0500
>>
>>I get most of mine off of either http://everquest.gamestats.com or there
>>is a EQ Clerics page I go to... I don't remember the URL but there is a
>>link to it in the "links" section of http://www.eqdruids.com
>>
>>Both have pretty good descriptions of the cleric armor quests. So far
>>I've only done the quest for the cleric greaves... but I'm actually
>>thinking of getting rid of the greaves and camping for gatorskin legs
>>instead... I don't see the point of wearing greaves that improve my
>>intelligence when I can get gatorskin leggings that improve my Wisdom.
>>
>>-Eachann Bronzeleaf
>>-Cleric of Tunare, Tarew Marr
>>
